title: Sex, Lies & Murder
description: When a woman is murdered, a web of sex and lies is uncovered, revealing a prominent family’s dark secrets. Detectives and an FBI informant tell Dennis Murphy about the case for the first time.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
